en: Alaska CS27 zone 1: Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant A) (Alaska_CS27_zone_1)
If using Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant B) method (code 9815), Ec=2685642.82 ftUS, Nc=1887198.47 ftUS.
